comment.content: 무인단말기 개발할 떄 보니까, 터치스크린이 마우스같은 역할을 하던데요?

comment.author: 오승준
comment.content: I have couple of experiences. Let me know what you need.

post.content:
Could you please let me know if anybody has any experience on building a Kiosk?    I need so help to understand the process and what it takes to complete it....  And mostly what software you used...

I appreciate any assistance people can provide.
Thanks
Jay S.
post.title: [Need help] Kiosk design
